summary: A sleazy Hollywood agent tricks one of his clients, a faded action star, into playing King Lear in an amateur charity production in England.
cast: Burt Reynolds|Alexandra Weaver|Elesia Marie|Sarah Goldberg|Glynis Brooks|Camilla Arfwedson|Michael Wildman|Guy Flanagan|John Moraitis|Pat Starr|Maisie Scott|Charles Durning|Pandora Colin|Lucy Akhurst|Stephen Gressieux|Terence Maynard|Heidi Monsen|Dido Miles|Samantha Bond|Imelda Staunton|Taz|Lorraine Ashbourne|Gemma Lawrence|Peter Gunn|Tony Jayawardena|Alistair Petrie|Derek Jacobi|Ciaran O'Quigley|Lawrence Sheldon|John Lightbody|Peter Wight|Kelly Price|Surendra Kochar|Gabrielle Hamilton|Charlotte Buttery|Kirsty More|Tony Axup|Victoria Hamilton-Barritt|Rad Lazar|Richard James|Augustina Amoa|Arthur Benjamins|Ty Davies|Sanjiv Hayre|Libby Hayter|Silvia Lombardo|Leigh Stevenson|Chris Wilson
title: A Bunch of Amateurs
